articles.author: Aggam Walia, Sukalp Sharma
articles.title: Why green hydrogen presents both major opportunities and significant challenges - The Indian Express
articles.description: The Govt has announced a scheme to support efforts to test the viability of green hydrogen as a fuel for cars and heavy vehicles. Green hydrogen presents both a big opportunity and some major challenges.
articles.content: The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) has announced a Rs-496-crore (until 2025-26) scheme to support pilot projects that either test the viability of green hydrogen as a vehicle fuel or dev… [+6823 chars]

articles.title: Tata Motors registered total sales of 2,65090 units in Q4 FY24 - Tata Motors
articles.description:
Total PV Sales of 1,55,651 units, +15% YoY
Total CV Sales of 1,09,439 units, -6% YoY

Tata Motors Limited sales in the domestic & international market for Q4 FY 2023-24 stood at 2,65,090 vehicles, compared to 2,51,822 units during Q4 FY 2022-23.
articles.content:

  • Total CV Sales of 1,09,439 units, -6% YoY
